page.title: 10A Day In My Life.
page.content: My name is Carla Holz, I am eleven years old and have lived in Snailbeach for ten years. I wake up about 8 a.m., wash and dress and at about 8.15 I make breakfast. I usually have Coco Pops. I have three sisters and two brothers. Nicola leaves for school at 8.30. Then I do my hair. I leave for the bus stop at about nine o clock. We reach school around quarter past nine. When we arrive we read. In the morning we do maths and language work. In the afternoon we have story and we then do project work. The bus collects us at half past three and I get home about quarter to four. Nicola arrives about quarter past four. Adrian, my brother, is having exams and goes to school for only three days a week. I usually do some jobs for mum then go for a walk. Sometimes I watch T.V. I go to bed at about 8.30 and read till 9.00.
